tool_description:
Between the 1870s and the 1990s, Canada's federal government took more than 150,000 First Nations, Métis and Inuit children from their families and forced them to attend church-run residential schools designed to assimilate them by stripping them of their own languages and cultures.

A national inquiry revealed the extent of abuse and neglect the children faced in those schools. The Truth and Reconciliation (TRC) Commission of Canada has found evidence that 4,100 children died of disease, mal...
name: Canadian Residential Schools
title: Canadian Residential Schools

api_list.name: Residential Schools
api_list.description: This is a list of all of the Residential Schools per the most recent information from the Canadian Truth and Reconciliation Commission.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://canadian-residential-schools.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "canadian-residential-schools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://canadian-residential-schools.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "canadian-residential-schools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
